tweets.text: RT @niccruzpatane: VP of Tesla Vehicle Engineering @larsmoravy sat down with Car and Driver and discussed how Tesla was able to engineer 40‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
VP of Tesla Vehicle Engineering @larsmoravy sat down with Car and Driver and discussed how Tesla was able to engineer 400 pounds out of the new Model X over the years: 

He jokingly incentivizes engineers with a case of beer for every kilogram saved (a lot of beer was bought for this project lol).

‚Ä¢ Rear motor switched from induction to permanent-magnet and optimized half-shafts saved ~100 lbs
‚Ä¢ Battery pack redesign (denser cells, vertical modules, ~300 fewer cells, structural tweaks) saved 90 lbs, though capacity remained unchanged.
‚Ä¢ Interior included new upgraded parts, new manufacturing processes, airbag integration into headliner fabric, and new seat configurations added an extra 80 lbs of savings.
‚Ä¢ High-voltage wiring optimization, and switch from copper to aluminum saved 44 lbs.
‚Ä¢ New simplified cooling system saved 30 pounds.
‚Ä¢ Larger front/rear megacastings (8 pieces to 4): >20 lb saved and 10% higher torsional stiffness.
‚Ä¢ New Lithium-ion 12-V battery saved 14 lbs. 
‚Ä¢  Front/rear suspension tweaks saved 10 lbs. 
‚Ä¢  Thinner plastic fascias saved 10 lbs. 
‚Ä¢  New cast refrigerant manifold saved 3lbs.

RT @MarioNawfal: üö®üá∫üá∏ SCOTT JENNINGS: ELON GOT INVOLVED IN GOVT BECAUSE HE FEARS THE DOWNFALL OF AMERICA

‚ÄúI interviewed Elon Musk for this‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
üö®üá∫üá∏ SCOTT JENNINGS: ELON GOT INVOLVED IN GOVT BECAUSE HE FEARS THE DOWNFALL OF AMERICA

‚ÄúI interviewed Elon Musk for this book, and he was describing his fear about America. 

You‚Äôve got $40 trillion debt, devaluation of the currency, a mass migration crisis, low birth rates. He sees all these things converging.

It‚Äôs not just the downfall of America, it‚Äôs the downfall of the West. And I asked him, why are you here? He said, I‚Äôm trying to find a way not to make America go bankrupt.

He talked about immigration, the mass migration crisis, the birth rate. 

He sees these macro problems converging and leading to America‚Äôs downfall. 

That‚Äôs why he supported Trump and went to work in the government.

When I interviewed him in the White House on day 101, I could tell he was frustrated. 

He didn‚Äôt find anybody in Washington who shared his urgency, especially on fiscal issues.‚Äù

Source: @ScottJenningsKY @PBDsPodcast

tweets.text:
RT @MarioNawfal: ELON: REPEAT VIOLENT OFFENDERS NEED TO BE INCARCERATED

‚ÄúWe do have a serious issue in America, where repeat violent offen‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
ELON: REPEAT VIOLENT OFFENDERS NEED TO BE INCARCERATED

‚ÄúWe do have a serious issue in America, where repeat violent offenders need to be incarcerated. 

You've got cases where somebody's been arrested 47 times.

That's just the number of times they were arrested, not the number of times they did things. 

Most of the times they do things, they're not arrested. 

The key is, like, it preys on people's empathy.

So, if you're a good person, you want good things to happen in the world, you're like, well, we should take care of people who are down on their luck or having a hard time in life. 

And we should. 

I agree. 

But what we shouldn't do is put people who are violent drug zombies in public places where they can hurt other people.‚Äù

Source: @elonmusk on The Joe Rogan Experience @joerogan, October 31, 2025
